author: EvilMariobot

text:
so that's why SupraDarky never uploaded any DW music. figures. real shame since DW music is monumentally awesome. they mix adreneline-pumping guitars with sexy smooth Chinese flutes and it just kicks loads of butt. Fits the theme perfectly. it's simular to how Ys combines guitars and violins. can't forget to mention Samurai Warriors' neat techno/oriental mixed style music too. love it all :)
as a long time Warriors fan I'm excited to see what HW's got in stock.

text:
@*****

author: Jirt

text: I'll admit I never had any interest in the Dynasty Warriors-type games, but I want to play this game solely because of the Zelda setting (I'm sure a lot of people feel the same way). The soundtrack is really solid from what I've heard, with some refreshingly nice rocking takes on a couple classic Zelda themes. That is one scary Moon.
